MaxResults.description: The maximum number of items to return for this call. The call also returns a token that you can specify in a subsequent call to get the next set of results.

NextToken.description: A token to start the list. Use this token to get the next set of results.

ParameterFilters.description: Filters to limit the request results.

Path.description: The hierarchy for the parameter. Hierarchies start with a forward slash (/) and end with the parameter name. A hierarchy can have a maximum of five levels. Examples: /Environment/Test/DBString003 /Finance/Prod/IAD/OS/WinServ2016/license15

Recursive.description: Retrieve all parameters within a hierarchy.

WithDecryption.description: Retrieve all parameters in a hierarchy with their value decrypted.
